g.text: It will be helpful if you get someone who knows you well
to go over this list with you
and help you to analyse yourself by each of these causes of failure
Most people cannot see themselves as others see them
Lack of a Well-Defined Purpose in Life
98% of people have no such aim
this was the major cause of their failure
Lack of Ambition to Aim Above Mediocrity
do not want to get ahead in life
may be overcome with relative ease
you are paid for what you do with what you know
You must control all negative qualities
self-mastery is the hardest job you'll ever do
if you do not conquer yourself,
you will be conquered by yourself
- overeating of foods not conducive to good health
- wrong habits of thought, or negative thinking
- wrong use of, or over-indulgence in, sex
- inadequate supply of fresh air, due to improper breathing
most people who have criminal tendencies
aquire them as a result of bad environment
and improper associates during their childhood or youth
one of the most common causes of failure
we are waiting for "the time to be right"
do not wait! the time will never be "just right"!
most of us are good starters, but poor finishers,
people are prone to give up at the first signs of defeat
there is no substitute for persistence
a negative personality will not induce
Lack of Control of Sexual Urges
sexual energy is the most powerful of all stimuli that move people into action
if it is controlled, it can be converted into other creative channels
the gambling instinct drives millions of people to failure
evidence of this may be found in the stock market crash of 1929
that is why Hill used the term "gambling" when he referred to the stock market
Lack of a Well-Defined Power of Decision
those who fail reach decisions very slowly and change them frequently, and quickly
where one is found, the other is also usually found
kill off this pair before they completely tie you to the treadmill of failure
One or More of the Six Basic Fears
Wrong Selection of a Mate in Marriage
this is a most common cause of failure
unless this relationship is harmonious, failure is likely to follow
moreover, it will be a form of failure that destoys ambition
the person who takes no chances generally has
to take whatever is left when others are through choosing
over-caution is as bad as under-caution
both are extremes to be guarded against
life itself is filled with the element of chance
Wrong Selection of Associates in Business
you should use great care to select an employer who is an inspiration
and who is intelligent and successful
we emulate those with whom we associate most closely
pick an employer who is worth emulating
superstition is a form of fear. it is also a sign of ignorance
successful people keep open minds, and are afraid of nothing
you cannot have outstanding success in work that you do not like
the jack of all trades seldom is good at any
concentrate all of your efforts on one definite chief aim
you cannot succeed if you are eternally in fear of poverty
form the habit of systematic saving
by putting aside a definite percentage of your income
money in the bank gives you a very safe foundation of courage
when bargaining for the sale of personal services
without money, you must take what you're offered,
and be glad to get it
without enthusiasm, you cannot be convincing.
moreover, enthusiasm is contagious, and the person who has it under control
is generally welcome in any group of people
the person with a closed mind on any subject seldom gets ahead
intolerance means that you have stopped aquiring knowledge
the most damaging forms of intolerance
are those connected with religious, racial and political differences of opinion
the most damaging forms of intemperance are those connected with
More people lose their positions, and their big opportunities in life,
because of this fault, than for all other reasons combined
it is a fault that no well-informed businessperson or leader will tolerate
Possession of Power that was not Aquired Through Self-Effort
power in the hands of one who did not aquire it gradually is often fatal to success
quick riches are more dangerous than poverty
there is no substitute for honesty
there is no hope for you if you are dishonest by choice
these qualities serve as red lights that warn others to keep away
most people are too indifferent or lazy to aquire facts with which to think accurately
they prefer to act on opinions created by guesswork or snap judgements
this is a common cause of failure among those who start out in business for the first time
you must have a sufficient reserve of capital
to absorb the shock of your mistakes
and to carry you over until you have established a reputation
Here, Name any Particular Cause of Failure
that has not been included in the foregoing list
